title: Error null is not an object (evaluating 'e.trim')
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: `null is not an object (evaluating 'e.trim')` submitting empty passphrase via `Return`(iOS)/`Done`(Android) keyboard buttons when recovering an account 

```
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: PRETTY PRINTED EXCEPTION
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: 
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: ***
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: NAME: "TypeError"
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: null is not an object (evaluating 'e.trim')
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: 
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:20507
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: trim@index.android.bundle:12:1407814
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: sanitize_passphrase@index.android.bundle:12:6232035
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: recover_account_BANG_@index.android.bundle:12:6234681
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: G__30192_30198@index.android.bundle:12:6254255
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:1589195
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: invoke_interceptor_fn@index.android.bundle:12:1544436
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: invoke_interceptors@index.android.bundle:12:1544737
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: execute@index.android.bundle:12:1547107
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: handle@index.android.bundle:12:1555599
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_process_1st_event_in_queue$arity$1@index.android.bundle:12:1582684
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_run_queue$arity$1@index.android.bundle:12:1567669
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:1570849
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_fsm_trigger$arity$3@index.android.bundle:12:1575060
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:1568971
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:24:1801
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: k@index.android.bundle:24:643
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: q@index.android.bundle:24:1007
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: callImmediates@index.android.bundle:24:3202
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:19:2904
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:19:1377
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:19:2621
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:19:1347
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code]
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:19:962
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code]
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: 
03:51 I/ReactNativeJS: ***
```

#### Actual behavior

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/46460848-e2a8d400-c7c5-11e8-8c65-d0741771dc0e.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/46472826-16482600-c7e7-11e8-8bab-ffef29f7d59a.png)

### Expected behavior 
`Required field` tooltip appears above passphrase field

### Reproduction

- Open Status
- Tap add existing account
- Tap into password field and start entering password
- Enter 11111 and tap `Return`(iOS)/`Done`(Android) on keyboard
